page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
I normally wake up at seven o'clock, then I read for ten minutes.I get dressed and have my breakfast watching T.V. I have, cereal,toast and a cup of tea.After breakfast I go upstairs to clean my teeth and wash my face.Then we go to school in the car,I get to school at ten minutes to nine,school opens at five minutes to nine.When I get to school we read for twenty-five minutes,then we have maths and english.We have two breaks.One morning break and a lunch break.In the afternoon we do art or some kind of project.After that we have an assembly.We leave school at fifteen minutes past three.When I get home I get changed and watch T.V.
BY Jonathan Minchin
